name: Diamond Rune Sage
description:
This is a challenge to get a high score and a higher degree of difficulty for the purpose of the game. The game has nine different rune diamonds, you can drag the rune diamond on the entire row or column, or exchange position of the screen in two adjacent rune diamond, a three or more of the same rune diamond on the line will disappear, and you will get points. When you score gradually increase, it will enter higher levels of difficulty, to accept the challenge more difficult.

这是一个以获得高分和挑战更高难度为目的的游戏。游戏中有九种不同的符文钻石,您可以拖动整行或整列上的符文钻石,或交换屏幕中两个相邻符文钻石的位置,一条直线上的三个或三个以上的相同符文钻石将会消失,而您将得到分数。当您的分数逐步提高后,将会进入更高难度的关卡,接受更高难度的挑战
